Description:
Sales / Business Development professional for KSA (Recruitment Industry).We are Qatar’s leading Manpower service and HR Solution provider, and we are Looking for Sales professional for our KSA location.I am writing to check if you would like to pursue this opportunity.Role For - Sales / Business Development professional.Location- KSA /Saudi ArabiaCompany – People Dynamics, Qatar (Part of IHorizons group, Qatar as a parent company)Selling People Dynamics services and starting our services in the KSA market from scratch. The role holder carries revenue targets and will be responsible for meeting and exceeding them year after year. They will manage relationships with their clients, serve as the single point of contact between clients and the delivery team and perform all tasks related to administering their accounts. Help People Dynamics to establish itself in the KSA market as a profitable company.Job ObjectivesIntroduce and help to establish People Dynamics’s services in KSA.
Meeting revenue targets with reasonable gross margins
Bringing in a new client logo
Managing the entire sales lifecycle
Account ManagementSkills
Skills: VISA (If KSA is based out)– Freelance VISA / Transferrable IQAMA preferred.
